name: part_011
file: tmp_【新3Dお披露目】周防パトラ生誕祭！ゲスト FUWAMOCO＆豪華ビデオレター！重大告知あり！Birthday Party 2025【周防パトラ】 [bubs05N-m04]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Suou Patra performs her song 'Kuso Game Nante Kono Yo Ni Nai' on a pink, game-themed 3D stage.
scenes.song_name: Kuso Game Nante Kono Yo Ni Nai

scenes.description: The music fades out as the scene transitions to the post-performance talk section.
Suou Patra introduces the special details of her birthday stage, including the presents and decorations.
Suou Patra is joined by 'Shiropato' (her white-clad version) and they conclude the birthday celebration together.
A closing message from Suou Patra appears on the screen.

subtitles.original: けれどもクソゲーなんて
subtitles.english: But there are no shitty games...

subtitles.original: この世にない
subtitles.english: ...in this world.

subtitles.original: クリアして笑ってやるんだ
subtitles.english: I'll clear them and laugh.

subtitles.original: みんな笑え みんな踊れ
subtitles.english: Everyone laugh, everyone dance!

subtitles.original: 一吐息も我慢してるんだろう
subtitles.english: You're holding your breath, aren't you?

subtitles.original: ダサいのにね 羨ましい
subtitles.english: It's lame, but I'm jealous.

subtitles.original: そんな風に生きてみたいな
subtitles.english: I want to live like that too.

subtitles.original: 気がついたらみんなみんな手呼びかけたりしてる
subtitles.english: When I noticed, I was calling out to everyone.

subtitles.original: 神ゲー レアゲー 行くぜ 好奇心は止められない
subtitles.english: God-tier game, rare game, let's go! Can't stop the curiosity.

subtitles.original: 良いことも悪いことも 君の人生の味方になれ
subtitles.english: Good or bad, I'll be an ally in your life.

subtitles.original: みんな踊れ みんな叫べ
subtitles.english: Everyone dance, everyone shout!

subtitles.original: ゲームオーバーまたリトライすればいい
subtitles.english: Game over? Just retry again!

subtitles.original: 諦められない ここで
subtitles.english: I can't give up here.

subtitles.original: ハッピーエンドにこそみんな笑え
subtitles.english: Everyone laugh at the happy end!

subtitles.original: みんな踊れ 夢だけが
subtitles.english: Everyone dance, so your dreams...

subtitles.original: 綺麗事じゃないように
subtitles.english: ...won't be just lip service.

subtitles.original: 甘い約束 エトセトラ 悲しい時には泣けばいいんだよ
subtitles.english: Sweet promises and so on, it's okay to cry when you're sad.

subtitles.original: なんでそんなに難しい顔してるんですか？
subtitles.english: Why are you making such a difficult face?

subtitles.original: まあ ゴールしてもいいかな？
subtitles.english: Well, is it okay if I goal already?

subtitles.original: いやいや 思いを込めたもの全てを見届けたい
subtitles.english: No, no, I want to see everything I put my heart into through to the end.

subtitles.original: そんな行方が見たいだけ
subtitles.english: I just want to see how it turns out.

subtitles.original: みんなみんな不安なんだ 世の中にね
subtitles.english: Everyone, everyone is anxious in this world.

subtitles.original: 自分のこと許してくれる人がいるのかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if there's someone who will forgive me.

subtitles.original: 挑戦したら勇者
subtitles.english: If you take the challenge, you're a hero.

subtitles.original: みんな踊れ みんな叫べ
subtitles.english: Everyone dance, everyone shout!

subtitles.original: 知らないこと無理したけれども
subtitles.english: I tried hard even though I didn't know.

subtitles.original: クソゲーなんてこの世にない
subtitles.english: There are no shitty games in this world.

subtitles.original: クリアして見せて笑ってやるんだ
subtitles.english: I'll show you I can clear it and laugh.

subtitles.original: おーい、お疲れ様でしたー！
subtitles.english: Phew, good job everyone!

subtitles.original: ね、カニカマもいてくれたの？
subtitles.english: Hey, were the Kanikama here too?

subtitles.original: どうもお疲れ様でした
subtitles.english: Thank you very much, good job.

subtitles.original: いや今日はね、あ、みんな！みんな！みんな！終わってたよ
subtitles.english: So today... ah, everyone! It's over!

subtitles.original: 今日はね、あの、なんと前回と同じステージと思いつつ
subtitles.english: Today, while it might look like the same stage as last time...

subtitles.original: ちょっとね、変化があるんですよ
subtitles.english: ...there are actually some changes!

subtitles.original: ステージの紹介をしたいなーって思います
subtitles.english: I'd like to introduce the stage details.

subtitles.original: まだまだあるよ
subtitles.english: There's still more.

subtitles.original: 見て見て見て見てこれ
subtitles.english: Look, look, look at this!

subtitles.original: なんと前回よりもプレゼントが増えています！ダダーン！
subtitles.english: There are even more presents than last time! Ta-da!

subtitles.original: ほらほら何が入っているのかなーっていうね形になってるのと
subtitles.english: See? It's like "I wonder what's inside?"

subtitles.original: あとここ！カニカマがちょっと変化してます 分かるでしょうか？
subtitles.english: And here! The Kanikama have changed a bit. Can you tell?

subtitles.original: えー、最低の間違い探しじゃないですけど
subtitles.english: Well, it's not like a high-level "spot the difference," but...

subtitles.original: 微っ妙に変わっております
subtitles.english: ...they have changed slightly.

subtitles.original: なんとカニカマが増えています！
subtitles.english: Surprisingly, the number of Kanikama has increased!

subtitles.original: 気づいた？気づいたかな？
subtitles.english: Did you notice? I wonder if you did.

subtitles.original: あとステージ全体はこうなってまーす！
subtitles.english: And here's the entire stage!

subtitles.original: おおー豪華！
subtitles.english: Ooh, so luxurious!

subtitles.original: すごいよね、キラキラ度も増しております
subtitles.english: It's amazing, isn't it? The sparkle level has also increased.

subtitles.original: みんなも応援ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you all for the support!

subtitles.original: それからね、でーっかいサムネイル、可愛い！
subtitles.english: And look at this huge thumbnail, so cute!

subtitles.original: 同じ同じポ、ポ、なんか違うような気がするけど…あ、同じポーズ！
subtitles.english: The same po-pose... I feel like it's a bit different, but... ah, same pose!

subtitles.original: ね、すごい豪華に描いてもらえました
subtitles.english: Right? I had it drawn so luxuriously.

subtitles.original: それから、あ！はい！シロパトー！
subtitles.english: And also, ah! Yes! Shiropato!

subtitles.original: はいはいはい、今日のね、はい、あまりね出番がなかったシロパトちゃんです！
subtitles.english: Yes, yes! This is Shiropato, who didn't get much screen time today!

subtitles.original: ね、今日はね1曲目ね歌ってくれてどうもありがとうねシロパト
subtitles.english: Hey, thank you for singing the first song today, Shiropato.

subtitles.original: みんなは白と黒どっちのパトラが好き？
subtitles.english: Do you guys like white or black Patra better?

subtitles.original: お！あ、ね、シロパトちゃんの方がちょっとね柔らかいの ほら跳ねて跳ねて
subtitles.english: Oh! Shiropato is a bit softer, see? Boing, boing!

subtitles.original: そうのなの、やっぱパトはね鉄製のねベルトが巻いてあるからね
subtitles.english: That's right, because black Pato has a steel belt wrapped around her.

subtitles.original: シロパトちゃんの方が柔らかいんですよ
subtitles.english: Shiropato is definitely softer.

subtitles.original: ほらほらよく見て見て二人のツーショット
subtitles.english: Look closely at this two-shot of us.

subtitles.original: みんなどっちが好きかな？どっちも好き？
subtitles.english: I wonder which one you like? Or do you like both?

subtitles.original: あ、ありがとうございます！あ、じゃあ高評価チャンネル登録もぜひよろしくお願いしまーす！
subtitles.english: Ah, thank you! Please remember to like and subscribe!

subtitles.original: みんな本当に今日はありがとう！これからもよろしくね！バイバイ！
subtitles.english: Thank you all so much for today! See you next time! Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: 生誕祭ライブ終わりました！
subtitles.english: The birthday festival live is over!

subtitles.original: つたない歌と豪華なステージで はしゃぐパトが今年もできたのは あなたのおかげです。
subtitles.english: The reason Pato was able to have fun with my unpolished singing and a luxurious stage this year too is thanks to you.

subtitles.original: 今日もこの世界に生きててくれてありがとう！パトは今皆といることが一番楽しいです。
subtitles.english: Thank you for living in this world today too! Pato is happiest being with everyone right now.

subtitles.original: それはきっと世界で一番幸せなことです。
subtitles.english: That is surely the happiest thing in the world.
